long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UpSide is your always-on Gen AI assistant, minimize context switching to complete tasks and boost productivity. UpGPT includes capabilities from AI search and knowledge management to summarizing meetings, creating tasks, writing emails, updating CRM, and more.
long.en_US: UpMeeting可以協助您進行Teams會議，並透過AI分析、擷取重要資訊。
